one.title: How does Appin7 work?
one.subTitle: Appin7 by Nexovia Digital uses advanced technologies to extract the content and features from your website and transform them into a mobile app.

two.title: Will my mobile app have the same look and feel as my website?
two.subTitle: Appin7 strives to maintain the design elements of your website, ensuring a consistent brand experience in the mobile app.

three.title: Is Appin7 by Nexovia Digital compatible with iOS and Android?
three.subTitle: Yes, Appin7 supports both iOS and Android platforms, ensuring broad compatibility for your mobile app.

four.title: Can I add additional features or functionalities to my mobile app?
four.subTitle: Appin7 offers flexibility to integrate additional features and functionalities into your web site. Those additional changes would similarly get synced automatically.

one.title: Stay Ahead Of Competitors
one.subTitle: If your goal is to have your website completed within a month or two, Appin7 can complete it in just two weeks

1.title: Native App
1.subTitle: We use specific programming languages and application programming interfaces (APIs) to replicate website functionalities into an interactive mobile experience that is specific to the platform it's designed for.

2.title: Hybrid App
2.subTitle: involves using web languages such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that can be compiled as native apps that can function across multiple  platforms without sacrificing website features.

3.title: Cross-Platform App
3.subTitle: We  develop these using frameworks like React Native or Flutter which allow us to efficiently create apps that run on both iOS and Android. By utilizing this approach we can maintain native performance and achieve faster development.

4.title: Low-code Development
4.subTitle: We deploy website functionalities as fully-functional mobile applications using a Web view component approach. In this scenario, we integrate website content within a native container for quick deployment of website features.

one.title: For our business, collaborating with Appin7 has been a wise strategic choice. Their creative solutions, training, continuous support for our web flow users, and progressive approach have given us a competitive advantage in the industry. Additionally, they developed highly effective automated workflows for form submission, content publication, and user administration. We hope for a fruitful long-term partnership with their group.

two.title: Working with Appin7 for a considerable amount of time, we have found that they are the most reliable company. They are always there to help with SEO and advertising to increase product visibility when we need them. Furthermore, it provided data analytics services to aid in our understanding of industry trends and our company's sales on Amazon statistical data. We sincerely admire our collaboration with it.
